subject: Re: [PATCH v4 25/31] mm: vmscan: prepare for reparenting traditional LRU folios

reviews.author: Qi Zheng (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Qi Zheng pointed out the need to reparent LRU folios together with their corresponding object cgroups (objcgs) to avoid potential deadlocks.

reviews.author: Shakeel Butt
reviews.summary: Shakeel Butt reviewed the patch series and provided feedback on several patches, including suggestions to improve code organization, fix potential issues, and clarify comments.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Usama Arif, raised a concern that the patch might break lockdep on more than 4 NUMA nodes due to acquiring two locks per node.

reviews.author: Harry Yoo
reviews.summary: Reviewer Harry Yoo pointed out a type mismatch in the nr_pages parameter of mem_cgroup_update_lru_size() and suggested it should be long instead of int.
